Full of wonder, skill and strategy.

I got this game in early January on the Oculus Go. Really good graphics, high definition, smooth movement and a good progression.
When you first start you will gain Relic Dust which currently is only used to get different wands and different outfits. These items are aesthetic only and do not affect your gameplay.
Also, you will earn Spell Tokens to get additional spells to place on your wand. Before too long of playing, you will have gained enough tokens to have all the spells available. In the early days it is more a question of in what order do you want to get the spells. As you progress you will gain an additional two wands up to a current total of three. Each of these can have a different spell set-up/combination that you create to use depending on what type of match/duel you find yourself in.
I found the learning curve of this game, incredibly steep. When you decide to use the portal to find a duel, you also have the option to explore the different arenas, duel the AI (Artificial intelligence), use the practice hall or play a friendly duel. I would encourage using these options to get a feel for the game, before offering yourself up to duel anyone that is available at that time.
This is not a classic FPS. There is a lot strategy, anticipation, manipulation, planning of how you are going to duel. This will change each duel as the player and their wand setup can change, as well as the arena the duel takes place in. There really is a lot to this game; it is definitely a thinking persons game, not a run around firing off spells and hope to win.
Having said that, there is a dedicated Discord forum for Wands which is incredibly useful and helpful. All the members of the forum are friendly and knowledgable. They will help and support in any way they can.
When you first start off in this game, you will almost certainly begin a significant losing streak. This will last until you have played many duels, against many different opponents in all the different arenas. However, stick with it and use the discord forum. You will grow and develop and all of a sudden, the game will be one of, if not the best games you have.
